oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Storage of slurry in earth-banked lined basins in Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hellstedt, Maarit
AlaKleme, Teemu
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the first part information and literature of the use and regulations of this kind of slurry storages in different European countries was gathered up. The second part of the project was visits on four farms having earthen lined slurry storages.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hellstedt, Maarit and AlaKleme, Teemu (2011) Storage of slurry in earth-banked lined basins in Finland. In: Food, feed, fuel and fun : Nordic light on future land use and rural development, book of abstracts, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 7 (3), NJF Report, p. 218.
